titleStmt.title: The new-found Northerne deedle: or, Mirth and wit according to the times, fancies to fit, are in these following rimes To the tune of This is my grannams deedle.
titleStmt.author: Guy, Richard, writer of ballads.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and suggested publication date from STC.
Verse - "My mother's a good old woman,".
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
